channel.title: Need urgent help with combat style buttons
channel.description: i'm having problems with the combat styles when fighting without a weapon.. if i punch it trains strength, if i kick it trains defence, and if i block it trains attack can anyone help me with this?

i’m having problems with the combat styles when fighting without a weapon…
